conversation.content: [surprised] 诶，等等，她真的去了？Sarah昨晚给我打电话，然后...哇。她说她终于去参加那个社区剧团的试镜了，就因为我。[warm] 这个，嗯，还挺神奇的，因为我都不知道我帮了什么忙？[pause] 我是说，上周我们就是一起吃午饭，然后她提到自己特别怕上台表演，我好像就跟她说了说我第一次参加开放麦的事儿。就是怎么说呢，我当时就想，最坏的结果...其实也没那么糟，真的。[chuckle] 但我也没想要去激励谁什么的。[thoughtful] 我就是实话实说，说我也害怕过。可能这正是她需要听到的吧？就是害怕也没关系，照样可以去做。[quietly] 她说看我对冒险这么淡定，让她意识到自己想太多了。说来好笑的是，嗯...其实我内心一点都不淡定。[laugh softly] 我只是学会了不让恐惧的声音盖过内心的渴望，你懂我意思吗？[sincerely] 但是听说我竟然帮到了她，她还拿到了那个角色...哎呀。这种感觉比我自己得到任何掌声都要好。

original_conversation.content: [surprised] Wait, she actually did it? Sarah called me last night and... wow. She said she finally auditioned for that community theater thing because of me. [warm] Which is, um, kind of amazing because I didn't even know I was helping? [pause] I mean, we were just talking at lunch last week and she mentioned being terrified of performing, and I guess I told her about my first open mic night. How I just, you know, decided the worst thing that could happen was... not that bad, really. [chuckle] But I wasn't trying to be inspirational or anything. [thoughtful] I was just being honest about being scared too. Maybe that's what she needed to hear though? That it's okay to be afraid and do it anyway. [quietly] She said watching me be so calm about taking risks made her realize she was overthinking everything. Which is funny because, um... I don't feel calm inside. [laugh softly] I just learned to not let the fear be louder than the wanting, you know? [sincerely] But hearing that I helped her somehow, that she got the part... man. That feels better than any applause I've ever gotten myself.

subject: Your quiet confidence inspiring someone else to try something they were afraid to do
